QuestData.Title: Trouble at the Lake
QuestData.Description: You've been a great help in securing the mines and rescuing the trapped miners.$B$BThe Senate will be heartened to hear that you and Captain Tharran's mountaineers have made progress in securing Dun Morogh.$B$BWhat worries me is that I haven't seen any reports from Sergeant Bahrum and his detachment. They were sent east, along the road toward Helm's Bed Lake, and ordered to set up a small outpost. Would you go to Bahrum's Post and check in on the sergeant?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Sergeant Bahrum at Bahrum's Post.
QuestData.RewardText: It's a good thing the Senator didn't come out here on his own. It's dangerous, and we're going to need all the help we can get to get the situation under control.
